title: [K-12] 4C/ID-based Language Learning Program for Real-life Problem-solving Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: Focuses on cultivating structured problem-solving abilities in language domains for job seekers under guided support.

learning_goals: Learners can solve real-life problems presented in the language domain with over 80% accuracy through the phased scaffolding of the 4C/ID model.
Learners can collaborate with peers to share problem-solving processes and complete joint work using collaborative tools
Learners can organize and present language strategies acquired during problem-solving in a portfolio format and incorporate feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
